features.name: Support JS Bin's continued operation

features.name: Full, unmodified output

features.name: Save bins to Gist

features.name: Codecasting (unlimited)
features.tip: Allow viewers to watch you code, in real-time

features.name: Live reload (unlimited)
features.tip: Output live reloads as you code, in real-time
